component.name: mpv
component.summary: A free, open source, and cross-platform media player

description.p: Mpv is a movie player based on MPlayer and mplayer2. It supports a wide variety of video file formats, audio and video codecs, and subtitle types. Special input URL types are available to read input from a variety of sources other than disk files. Depending on platform, a variety of different video and audio output methods are supported.

ul.li: Flatpak: mpv-mpris support - multimedia keys play/pause support
Flatpak: mpv.conf: Screenshots (shortcut key 's') are saved in ~/Pictures/mpv directory
Flatpak: mpv_inhibit_gnome is included which prevents screen blanking in GNOME while playing media
Flatpak: mpv scripts needs write access. Use flatseal app to set home or host write permission
